comment: She is great just a little nosy....

She is there when you need her. It is a lot of stress if you do not stay on top of your work. We only had 2 quizzes and they were open book and online. Time limit of 20 minutes. Gives extra credit. I like her as a person.

Just take her! trust me! theres work but its easy. she loves you already she will do everything to give you an a . The class is enjoyable to be in! Just Take Her! Stop looking for other teachers and take her! just do it!

I loved Ms. Myles! She was by far my favorite professor for my first semester. At first her class seemed like a lot of work, and it was, but it was all really easy! 10 online discussions (really easy) and other projects. Just follow the syllabus, she makes it clear on what she wants. I would take her class again if I could! Take her if you can!

I would not have gotten through my first semester without her. I was in her learning community so I know her methods very well. She is extremely helpful and is almost always available to help and explain assignments.

Great teacher. Easy going and very likable. If you miss less than 3 days of class, youll get 3 points added to the final grade. not "a lot" of work, all VERY easy and theres 10 discussions online. Just, don't wait till the last minute to do them. Very helpful and kind. Seriously, take her.

Great professor might as well be your friend. The catch is all of the projects you have to do over the course of the semester. They're not hard at all but gets to be overwhelming on top of all your other classes. You will love her though, class was fun. Cruising with an A right now, just by keeping up with my work. Procrastination equals death

I enjoyed Ms. Myles! She is super personable and really helpful. She will reply to emails and is very involved in making sure you have do well. She cares about individuals! However, she gives a lot, a lot of work. It is not hard work, but it is a lot. Maybe it is a blessing in disguise?- i guess i will figure that out later.

Nicoly is an amazing teacher! She is easy and very nice! TAKE HER! She is very helpful as well. Its not mandatory to go to class, but you definitely should. The class is an easy A if you just do all of your work. You will enjoy her! She is so funny and nice! :)

She is awesome! She was the best teacher I couldve asked for. Coming straight from high school she made the transition as smooth as butter. Shes great, and babys you. You'll love her so take her!! LOL

I love her! she made class interesting. There are a lot of projects and assignments. Most of the time it felt like busy work, but honestly i found most of it to be helpful in the end. She wants the student to be successful and well prepared. papers, reading, group projects, research, speeches, presentations, etc.  I HIGHLY reccomend her!

Easy A. Gives extra credit. Quizzes don't count for much. She's really interested in you having a good first semester. She does give a lot of work but if you do it you'll get a god grade. Down to earth teacher who likes interacting with her students.
She is a pretty good teacher, however there is an assignment due at least once a week.
Great professor. Helped me out ALOT! Gives alot of work but its not to bad. I would recommend her.

An excellent teacher. I agree with the other person, she gives work, but it isn't that bad. She tells stories about her years as a student at KSU, so she is human. Definitely take her, but also do your work because if you don't it will drop your grade.
AWESOME teacher. so helpful and nice. very personable!

omg i love prof myles she is soooo wonderful and funny she is sweet but dont take her for granted. she gives work but it's nothing that you shouldn't be able to handle I LOVE HER SOOOOO MUCH MAKE SURE U TAKE HER FOR THIS CLASS!! :)
